snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Friday's selection includes items on Steve Jobs Avenue in Brazil, a promising new note-taking app and a strategy that is reported to have been...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Friday's selection includes items on Steve Jobs Avenue in Brazil, a promising new note-taking app and a strategy that is reported to have been proposed at RIM before the chief left.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Digital Designers, and 3-D Chocolate Printers
